forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. Southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this morning, the day dawns with the promise of warmth, the sun preparing to cast its golden rays on a city adorned with pastel hues. Highs are expected to flirt with 66 degrees before gently settling to a cooler embrace around 62 as afternoon approaches. A soft southwest breeze will whisper through the streets, occasionally quickening into a playful gust, bringing a sense of movement and vitality. 

Tonight, the sky will remain mostly clear, with a mild low of around 53 ensuring a comfortable end to the day. Given the forecasted clarity and the absence of fog typical for this time of year, the city presents itself as a canvas of inviting activities. One might choose to stroll along the waterfront, perhaps indulging in a leisurely café visit or wandering through the art-laden streets. Dressing in layers is advisable, as the morning chill gives way to a pleasant afternoon warmth, making a light jacket or cardigan the perfect companion for this joyful day in the city.
